metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39633 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In gre_handle_offloads of ip_gre.c, there is a possible page fault due to an invalid memory access. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-150694665References: Upstream kernel

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-39633` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic-64k - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-lowlatency - 5.13.0-19.19
No subscription required
